revisions.*:
'''Howard Edward Winklevoss, Jr.'''<ref>[http://books.google.ca/books?id=IDQhAQAAIAAJ&pg=PA1508&lpg=PA1508&dq=%22Howard+Edward+Winklevoss%22&source=bl&ots=pwsvdjNXy-&sig=s_NFhmhgkWn2iW2fqbYYJ-u3x5c&hl=en&sa=X&ei=iJpRVNinF8GOyASmooHICg&ved=0CCYQ6AEwBw]</ref> (born 1943) is an American [[Actuarial science|actuary]]. He is an academic and entrepreneur who has a practice in [[Human resource management|benefits management]].

Winklevoss is a former [[adjunct professor]] of [[insurance]] at the [[Wharton School]] of the [[University of Pennsylvania]].<ref>http://books.google.com/books?id=Bd5EAQAAQBAJ&pg=PA57&dq=howard+winklevoss+adjunct&hl=en&sa=X&ei=PoI_VM3vK7aAsQTrmoKgAQ&ved=0CB0Q6AEwAA#v=onepage&q=howard%20winklevoss%20adjunct&f=false</ref> He is a graduate of [[Grove City College]] and received a [[PhD]] in [[mathematics]] from the [[University of Oregon]].<ref>http://www.winklevoss2.com/index.php/ourpeople-2</ref> He has written more than 20 books, including ''Pension Mathematics with Numerical Illustrations''.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://search.proquest.com/docview/205240300?accountid=35803 |title=Chamber Opposes Early Retirement Bills |last=Munn |first=Russell |date=January 1990 |work=South Carolina Business Journal |accessdate=July 6, 2011 }} {{subscription}}</ref><ref name="About Us">{{cite web |url=http://www.winklevoss.com/wintech/company/index.asp?mt=2 |publisher=Winklevoss Technologies |title=About Us |accessdate=July 6, 2011 }}</ref> He is also the founder of Winklevoss Consultants and Winklevoss Technologies.<ref name="About Us"/>

Winklevoss is the father of athletes and entrepreneurs [[Cameron Winklevoss|Cameron]] and [[Tyler Winklevoss]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.businessweek.com/news/2011-01-11/facebook-seeks-finality-in-social-network-connectu-court-fight.html |title=Facebook Seeks Finality in 'Social Network' ConnectU Court Fight |last=Rosenblatt |first=Joel |date=January 11, 2011 |work=[[Bloomberg Businessweek]] |accessdate=July 6, 2011 }}</ref>

==Selected bibliography==
* ''Pension Mathematics with Numerical Illustrations'' (1977, 2d ed. 1993)
* ''Public Pension Plans: Standards of Design, Funding, and Reporting'' (1979, with Dan McGill)
